item.description:
This is a great chance to unwind after work and enjoy the beauty of the Charles River, the excitement of Harvard Square and to explore some of the quieter beautiful residential neighborhoods of Cambridge. We will also see some really nice flowering plants and trees.

We will meet in front of Au Bon Pain in Harvard Square. The parking meters are free after 6:00. It is also right next to the Red Line station. The walk should last about 2 hours and will be a lot of fun.
item.name: The Charles River, Harvard Square and the Gardens of Cambridge
